ygData.subject: Enter: The Battle to End All Battles
ygData.msgSnippet: (Carnage, Sixshot is currently in his tank form) The Oblitercons (Oblitertron)/Sixshot/Dark Wolf/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis

Subject: Enter: The Battle to End All Battles
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Carnage, Sixshot is currently in his tank form)

The Oblitercons (Oblitertron)/Sixshot/Dark Wolf/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:





Dark One saw Dark Lavatron, and decided it was time.  He launched two 
missiles at the Cybertronian Fire, blowing apart the last EMP cannon.  He 
transformed to his biped mode, using the boosters to land on his feet gently, 
near the other Oblitercons.

"Oblitercons, their defenses are broken!  Let the slaughter begin!"  Dark One 
leapt into the air, his body extending and changing to take the shape of a 
head and torso.

---

Breakdown heard his commander's orders and looked to him, and saw him take 
shape.  "Oblitercons, unite!" he yelled so the others heard him.  He 
transformed into the right arm of the gestalt, attaching to the right side of 
Dark One's chest form, making the right arm.

---

Pyro fired a fire ball, missing a missile launcher.  He was about to curse, 
but was interrupted by the muffled yell of Dark One, and the clear yell of 
Breakdown.  He instantly transformed into the shape of a left arm, and 
attached to Dark One, forming the left arm of the mighty Oblitertron.

---

Hiss slowly got up, and heard the yells.  He didn't understand any of them.  
His audio receptors were still scrambled, and internal repairs weren't 
finished fixing them yet.  But, when he saw them all taking the form of 
Oblitertron, the obvious answer as to what his comrades were yelling was 
known to him.

He leaped into the air, transforming into the shape of a right leg.  Via 
magnetics and some things only known by the deceased creators of the 
Oblitercons, Hiss' form was drawn to the right side of Oblitertron's pelivs, 
and attached.

---

Scavenger ducked under the missile, the explosion sending dirt and a small 
amount of shrapnel into his back.  He heard the yells, and transformed into 
the shape of a left leg, mid transformation eight shots striking him, but it 
didn't move him because of the magnetics, and he was drawn tot he left side 
of Oblitertron's pelvis, and attached.

---

The forty-five foot tall Oblitertron raised both arms and pounded them 
against his chest.  Dark One's mind easily took control of the gestalt, the 
four other minds not being as strong.  Yet, they still influenced Dark One's 
actions.  They were now one, Oblitertron.  But, Dark One's mind was just a 
tad bit more prevailing.  

"PUNY MAXIMALS WILL BE OBLITERATED!" he yelled as he drew his laser cannon 
from subspace and looked for a target.

---

Sixshot felt Dinobot's optic blast pound into his form and he swerved his 
turret to aim at the Maximal, and charged his single cannon.  But he was hit 
by a missile from the missile launchers which hit him in the left side of his 
turret.  The explosion ripped through his weakened armor, and knocked him 
onto the right side of his tank form.

"ARGH!" he yelled out in severe pain.  "TWO FORMS ALREADY DOWN!  Only four 
left..." He transformed to his armored carrier mode.

This mode is shaped like a tank, but it had no turrets.  Only two batteries 
with two smaller cannons inside.

He cursed, knowing his weapons wouldn't be as strong since he had to divert a 
bit of enegy to repairs, or he would eventually just go into stasis lock.

---

Demon Wulf watched the two other gestalts.  He was tired of having to deal 
with these Maximals.  They were certainly no challenge, and he was only 
getting hit by cheap pot shots.  He would not fight in a small battle like 
this just for pot shots.  And he certainly wouldn't be outdone by inferior 
Cybertronians. 

"MY BRETHREN!" he roared.  He leaped into the air.

Flesh Ripper heard his brother's yell, and leaped into the air.

Dark Claw heard the roar, and transformed into his biped mode, leaping into 
the air.

They did not transform into different forms, like a head, torso, leg, etc.  
They simply merged in a bright flash of crimson.

A 25 foot gestalt crashed to the ground, a mean looking sword in his right 
arm, his features resembling mostly Demon Wulf, except for the long dark 
claws on the tips of his fingers from Dark Claw, and the mean looking set of 
teeth from Flesh Ripper.

The smaller gestalt roared.  "Prepare, to die!"  Dark Wolf slammed a hoof on 
the ground, the leg looking like a wolf's only more human-like, and a hoof on 
the end instead of a paw.

---

Double Punch watched the shots go by, and the missile explode against the 
ground.  The shock wave of the missile knocked him on his skit plate.  He 
cursed.  "Getting closer, every slagging time."  He raised both pinchers, 
firing an energy-signature seeking missile from each at Sideswipe.

---

Injector fired off three stinger missiles from his left launcher at 
Sideswipe, and fired off two more from his other launcher at Ratchet.

---

Bumblebee fired off two stinger missiles intercepting the missile and a few 
shots.  The rest he blocked with his right arm and cried out in pain, 
returning fire with two stinger missiles at Torca.

---

Manterror fired off three ion disks from both arms, and watched the six disks 
impact with the shields.  He laughed as he saw the three Alliance gestalts 
form, and flew towards Prowl.

---

Ares felt the impact of the missile and shots and yelled out, slowly 
transforming to his biped mode.  He cursed, jumping back, a laser rifle in 
one hand.

---

Nemesis Enforcer yelled to Scattershot via comm. transmission.  "IRON RAPTOR 
IS IN THE BATTLE!  KILL HER!" He activated the boosters in his feet and held 
his wings aloft, keeping his arms akimbo with the rapid firing-laser rifle.

He flew at Iron Raptor, firing off ten rapid laser blasts at her torso.

---

Scattershot cursed at Nemesis Enforcer.  "Do this, do that..." he sighed, 
taking out a charge and tossing it at the Cybertronian Fire.  His face beamed 
with a sadistic smile as the charge got through the shields and blew up 
against the Maximal warship's hull.

---
